pr_title: Feature/programming exercise/mock connector requests for tests

timeline.message: Mock setup programming exercise check project requests
Mock create project for exercise rest calls
Mock programming exercise setup file and git services
Inject BambooServer into BambooBuildPlanService

Mock Bamboo permission requests for programming exercise setup tests

Reset database after test
Mock Bitbucket calls for start programming exercise

Mock Bamboo copy repository

Also refactor BambooUpdateService
Mock BitbucketBambooUpdateService for start exercise test
Wrap up programming exercise start participation connector integration tests

Fix programming exercise integration tests

Remove hardcoded constants
Properly mock git service calls and responses where necessary
Correctly fill generated test participations
Increase delay before checking scheduled tasks in ProgrammingExerciseScheduleServiceTest
Remove MockitoVerfication since Verifiable is sufficient
Move CI_TOKEN and related code from AbstractVersionControlService to GitLabService

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/programming-exercise/mock-connector-requests-for-tests

timeline.bodyText: can we avoid using transactional here? I removed it in a previous commit. I think you can just save the objects into the repositories if needed.
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.message: Remove transactional from test DBUtilService

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -591,10 +593,10 @@ public ProgrammingExerciseResource(ProgrammingExerciseRepository programmingExer
      * @return ResponseEntity with status
      * @throws IOException if submissions can't be zippedRequestBody
      */
-    @PostMapping(value = "/programming-exercises/{exerciseId}/export-repos-by-student-logins/{studentIds}")
+    @PostMapping(Endpoints.EXPORT_SUBMISSIONS_BY_STUDENT)
     @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('TA', 'INSTRUCTOR', 'ADMIN')")
     @FeatureToggle(Feature.PROGRAMMING_EXERCISES)
-    public ResponseEntity<Resource> exportSubmissionsByStudentLogins(@PathVariable Long exerciseId, @PathVariable String studentIds,
+    public ResponseEntity<Resource> exportSubmissionsByStudentLogins(@PathVariable("id") Long exerciseId, @PathVariable String studentIds,

timeline.bodyText:
Ideally we refactor this URL to something like
/programming-exercises/{exerciseId}/problem-statement
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: I refactored the endpoint and removed the now obsolete DTO ProblemStatementUpdate. I also updated the client and the related server test
replies.author: ungaralex

Refactor programming exercise problem statement update API endpoint
Add JavaDoc
Fix delay for Github?! actions server API schedule test
